attributes.action: ensure that convicted sex offenders are not granted a taxi or private hire licence by local authorities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taxi and Private Hire drivers in England are licenced by local authorities, after completing a CRB check. But did you know that some drivers have been issued with a licence, even though they have previously been convicted of a sexual offence? 

How many more of these decisions have been made that have not come to the attention of the public?
